actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional investment tax credit for property placed in service in certain economic redevelopment areas.
short_title: Economic Redevelopment Area Tax Incentive Act of 1980

summary.text: Economic Redevelopment Area Tax Incentive Act of 1980 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend investment tax credit treatment to qualified redevelopment property. Defines "qualified redevelopment property" as depreciable business property which is located in geographic areas which have been identified by the Secretary of Labor as having persistently high rates of unemployment. Sets the rate of such investment tax credit at 12 percent.

titles.title: Economic Redevelopment Area Tax Incentive Act of 1980
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional investment tax credit for property placed in service in certain economic redevelopment areas.
